title: What is Magnetic Aura and can it be Transmitted? Personal Journey and Experiments.
first_phrase: In the text preceding the last 200 tokens, the author describes his interest in certain readings, including Joseph Balsamo, which led him to conceive that the ability to heal was only transferable via occult initiation. However, he later abandoned these irrational ideas and decided to seek knowledge from experienced masters. In 1879, he registered with a magneto-therapeutic society under the presidency of Baron du Potet, but had to leave for England, much to his disappointment. In the remaining 200 tokens, the author expresses his burning curiosity for mystical sciences as he had tasted its knowledge and was thirsty for more, and his regret for having to leave Paris just as he was about to delve deeper into magneto-therapeutic practices.
content: Ces conceptions peu rationalistes furent bientôt reléguées dans le domaine des fantasmagories enfantines. Devenu esprit fort, je ne voulus plus voir dans le magnétisme qu’un agent essentiellement naturel, dont chacun peut faire application pourvu qu’il en connaisse les lois. Il importait donc de m’instruire auprès de maîtres expérimentés : c’était là toute l’initiation à laquelle je pouvais aspirer. Or, me trouvant à Paris vers la fin de 1879, je fus informé de la fondation d’une société magnéto-thérapique, sous la présidence du Baron du Potet. Je me fis inscrire, en me promettant de suivre avec assiduité des séances qui s’annonçaient comme hautement instructives. Mais voici que subitement j’eus à partir pour l’Angleterre. Ce me fut un amer contretemps, car le peu que je venais d’apprendre avait piqué au plus vif mon ardente curiosité. On ne mord pas au fruit de l’arbre des sciences mystérieuses sans perdre tout repos et brûler désormais de la soif de l’inconnu.
last_phrase: In conclusion, exploring the mysteries of magnetism can ignite a lifelong curiosity for the unknown. While some outdated beliefs have been relegated to the realm of childhood fancies, there are natural phenomena waiting to be understood. By seeking knowledge from experienced practitioners, we can discover the laws governing this fascinating force and unlock its potential benefits.
